DOC.brief_summary: 1 . Find early diagnostic marker erectile dysfunction ; 2 . Study warn role ED diseases .
DOC.brief_title: The Early Diagnosis Warning Role Erectile Dysfunction
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male least 18 year age . 2 . Provide sign informed consent . 3 . Have history erectile dysfunction ( ED : defined consistent change quality erection adversely affect subject 's satisfaction sexual intercourse ) . 4 . Have stable monogamous relationship female partner . To subject poor sexual experience , reevaluation would conduct 4weeks sex education . 5 . Make least four sexual intercourse attempt female sexual study partner 4week therapeutic period without medication . 6 . Agree use ED treatment least 4 week . 1. severe disease ( congestive heart failure , arrhythmia , significant renal hepatic dysfunction anemia ) ; 2 . Had clinically noteworthy penile deformity , pelvic surgery trauma perineal region ; 3 . Had receive longterm pharmacotherapy ( include antioxidant agent , vitamins traditional Chinese drug ) . 4 . An addiction problem ( history injection administration opium , poppy , heroin , hemp , morphine , cocaine , caffeine , ketamine meperidine etc . )
